allow: Bash(python3 -c " import sys, json for line in sys.stdin: try: obj = json.loads\(line.strip\(\)\) if obj.get\(''type''\) == ''assistant'' and ''message'' in obj: msg = obj[''message''] if isinstance\(msg, dict\) and ''content'' in msg: for block in msg[''content'']: if isinstance\(block, dict\) and block.get\(''type''\) == ''text'': print\(''ASSISTANT:'', block[''text''][:500]\) elif obj.get\(''type''\) == ''human'' and ''message'' in obj: msg = obj[''message''] if isinstance\(msg, dict\) and ''content'' in msg: for block in msg[''content'']: if isinstance\(block, dict\) and block.get\(''type''\) == ''text'': print\(''USER:'', block[''text''][:500]\) except: pass ")
